template.name: CyclicHandlerHead
template.parameter: int id, int period, int activation, int &cyc_bcet[N_HANDLERS], int &cyc_wcet[N_HANDLERS]

template.name: MainTaskBody
template.parameter: int id, int motor_control_id, int bt_read_id, int bt_write_id

transition.label: next_msg_type() != PKT_ID && next_msg_type() != PKT_PATH && next_msg_type() != PKT_POSITION && next_msg_type() != PKT_GRAPH && next_msg_type() != PKT_GOAL && next_msg_type() != PKT_MODE
next[id]?
status != S_GET_GOAL && status != S_GRIPPED && status != S_GO_S_DELIVER && status != S_DELIVERED
next[id]?
next[id]?
status = S_GO_HOME, route_wait = false, route_active = true, current_instr = -1
next[id]?
packet[0][0] = NULL, packet[0][1] = NULL, g_snd_tsk = id
next[id]?
grips := true, has_goal := true, status := S_GRIPPED

template.name: TaskHead
template.parameter: int id, int prio, int &bcet[N_TASKS], int &wcet[N_TASKS]

template.name: SyncDataQueue
template.parameter: int id, int rcv_tsk, int snd_tsk, int timeout

query.comment: can only be verified if btMsgGenerator is commented out

query.formula: A[] forall(i:task_range) Tasks(i).RUNNING imply not(exists(j:task_range) Tasks(i).id!=Tasks(j).id & Tasks(j).RUNNING)
query.comment: can only be verified if btMsgGenerator is commented out

query.formula: A[] forall(i:task_range) forall(j:task_range) Tasks(i).RUNNING & Tasks(j).READY & Tasks(j).prio<Tasks(i).prio imply Tasks(j).readyClk<=0
query.comment: can only be verified if btMsgGenerator is commented out

query.formula: A[] forall(i:task_range) Tasks(i).RUNNING imply not(exists(j:handler_range) (Handlers(j).READY | Handlers(j).RUNNING))
query.comment: can only be verified if btMsgGenerator is commented out

query.formula: A[] forall(i:handler_range) Handlers(i).RUNNING imply Handlers(i).c <= Handlers(i).period
query.comment: can only be verified if btMsgGenerator is commented out
can only be verified if btMsgGenerator is commented out
can only be verified if btMsgGenerator is commented out
can only be verified if btMsgGenerator is commented out
can only be verified if btMsgGenerator is commented out
